snippet.title: Monument Valley 3 | Official Announce Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
Set sail for adventure in MONUMENT VALLEY 3, a brand new story in the award-winning Monument Valley series. Coming exclusively to Netflix Games on December 10th!

About Netflix:
Netflix is one of the world's leading entertainment services, with 278 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, films and games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time.

Monument Valley 3 | Official Announce Trailer | Netflix
https://www.youtube.com/@Netflix

Begin a thrilling new voyage into an enchanting puzzle world. Navigate optical illusions to bring together a village and guide them to a new home.
